rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with colonial style finishes, featuring high ceilings and decorative moldings. Designed to align with Vastu principles by maintaining clear north-eastern direction for auspicious entry.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with classic colonial design elements, incorporating period furniture and modern amenities. Positioned to ensure adequate sunlight (south-west orientation) in accordance with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Elegant dining space adjacent to the living room, designed for entertaining guests. Carefully oriented to encourage positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped colonial-style kitchen with modern appliances and ample storage. Placed near the service entrance to ease logistics while observing Vastu by avoiding north-eastern placement of water elements.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated area for domestic help, including a bedroom and small pantry, positioned in the west wing as per Vastu guidelines for service areas.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Space for storage of cleaning supplies and additional utilities. Integrated into the kitchen area or adjacent to servant's quarters.

openings.notes: Aligns with Vastu principles ensuring auspicious entry.
Provides ample natural light and complies with colonial aesthetics.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Largest bedroom featuring a walk-in closet, en-suite bathroom and private balcony. Positioned in the north-west quadrant to enhance privacy and positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom with ample natural light from south-east windows.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Multi-purpose room serving as home office and study area, located in the east wing to align with Vastu's knowledge sector.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom facilities designed to be functional and aesthetically pleasing.

openings.notes: Provides a private outdoor space while ensuring proper ventilation.
Facilitates natural light and aligns with the knowledge sector in Vastu.
